xdb
Interface XSLT

public abstract interface XSLT
extends XML

The objectifizer of an XSLT document. The parameters of transformations can be set through the according primitives. Along with their declaration within the sheet, a default value can be assigned, too.

Method Summary

getDOM, getRecordset, getURI, load, load, save, setURI, store
 

Method Detail

setParameter

public void setParameter(java.lang.String parameterName,
                         java.lang.String parameterValue)
                  throws xdbException
Parameters:
parameterName - The parameter variable within the XSLT
parameterValue - The value to be set to
Throws:
xdbException - The sheet does not have such a parameter variable

                              throws xdbException
Parameters:
parameterName - The parameter variable within the XSLT
Returns:
The value of the parameter value
Throws:
xdbException - The sheet does not have such a parameter variable

transform

public void transform(XML sourceDocument,
                      XML destinationDocument)
               throws xdbException
Parameters:
sourceDocument - The XML to be transformed
destinationDocument - The empty XML which will hold the result. It really has to be an empty document. Conventional XML documents cannot be placed here.
Returns:
The resulting XML document
